mapper.insert: insert into user_information (user_id, user_nickname, score, days_sum, minutes_sum, continue_days, motto) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{daysSum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{minutesSum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{continueDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{motto,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update user_information set user_nickname = #{userNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, days_sum = #{daysSum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, minutes_sum = #{minutesSum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, continue_days = #{continueDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, motto = #{motto,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_nickname, score, days_sum, minutes_sum, continue_days, motto from user_information
